config.enableMod.name: Enable mod
config.enableMod.tooltip: Master switch for random monster ambushes.
config.checkInterval.name: Check interval (ticks)
config.checkInterval.tooltip: How often the mod checks for an ambush. 60 ticks = 1 second.
config.maxMonsters.name: Max monsters per ambush
config.maxMonsters.tooltip: Upper limit on how many monsters spawn at once.
config.minDistance.name: Minimum spawn distance
config.minDistance.tooltip: Closest monsters are allowed to spawn from the player (in tiles).
config.maxDistance.name: Maximum spawn distance
config.maxDistance.tooltip: Furthest monsters are allowed to spawn from the player (in tiles).
config.spawnChance.name: Ambush chance
config.spawnChance.tooltip: Chance (0–1) that an ambush happens when a check runs.
config.allowDaytime.name: Allow daytime ambushes
config.allowDaytime.tooltip: If disabled, ambushes are clamped to start at 6:00 PM or later.
config.ambushStartTime.name: Ambush start time
config.ambushStartTime.tooltip: Earliest time ambushes can start (e.g. 1800 = 6:00 PM). If daytime ambushes are disabled, this will be clamped to 6:00 PM or later.
config.skipEvents.name: Skip during events & festivals
config.skipEvents.tooltip: If enabled, ambushes are disabled during events and festivals.
config.skipFishingRod.name: Skip ambushes while holding a fishing rod
config.skipFishingRod.tooltip: If you currently have any fishing rod equipped, RandomMonsterAmbush won't spawn monsters.
config.disallowIndoors.name: Disallow indoors
config.disallowIndoors.tooltip: If enabled, ambushes will only happen in outdoor locations (ALL indoor locations are blocked).
config.monster.greenSlime.name: Green Slime
config.monster.greenSlime.tooltip: If enabled, Green Slimes can appear in ambushes (and as bosses if applicable).
config.monster.dustSpirit.name: Dust Spirit
config.monster.dustSpirit.tooltip: If enabled, Dust Spirits can appear in ambushes.
config.monster.bat.name: Bat
config.monster.bat.tooltip: If enabled, Bats can appear in ambushes.
config.monster.rockCrab.name: Rock Crab
config.monster.rockCrab.tooltip: If enabled, Rock Crabs can appear in ambushes.
config.monster.ghost.name: Ghost
config.monster.ghost.tooltip: If enabled, Ghosts can appear in ambushes (and as bosses).
config.monster.skeleton.name: Skeleton
config.monster.skeleton.tooltip: If enabled, Skeletons can appear in ambushes.
config.monster.squidKid.name: Squid Kid
config.monster.squidKid.tooltip: If enabled, Squid Kids can appear in ambushes (and as bosses).
config.monster.shadowBrute.name: Shadow Brute
config.monster.shadowBrute.tooltip: If enabled, Shadow Brutes can appear in ambushes (and as bosses).
config.monster.shadowShaman.name: Shadow Shaman
config.monster.shadowShaman.tooltip: If enabled, Shadow Shamans can appear in ambushes (and as bosses).
config.monster.serpent.name: Serpent
config.monster.serpent.tooltip: If enabled, Serpents can appear in ambushes (and as bosses).
config.enableBoss.name: Enable boss ambushes
config.enableBoss.tooltip: If enabled, some ambushes will contain one tougher elite monster.
config.bossChance.name: Boss ambush chance
config.bossChance.tooltip: Chance (0–1) that a successful ambush becomes a boss ambush.
config.bossHealthMult.name: Boss health multiplier
config.bossHealthMult.tooltip: How much to multiply boss HP. 2.0 means double health.
config.bossDamageMult.name: Boss damage multiplier
config.bossDamageMult.tooltip: How much to multiply boss damage. 2.0 means double damage.
